author: jtraglia
content: Hey CL client devs. What do we think about this PR? I think it's a nice config simplification, but I would like to hear from clients before merging it. https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4814

author: tersec
content: anything which contravenes that PR is broadly not a valid configuration anyway

author: tersec
content: so it's only removing false degrees of freedom
